籤詩版本二:
Ka whiti te hoari ina puta mai i roto i te pouaka, engari kaore i te kukume i te puehu i roto i te pouaka.
Inaianei he tangata rangatira taku hei whakaatu, he mana, he mana, a ka mihi katoa ki ahau
詩意:
Ko tenei hexagram e tohu ana i te hoari e puta mai ana i te pouaka.
He kaha, he kaha nga mea katoa.
解曰: Ka puta mai te hoari i te pouaka. He kanapa mo nga mano maero. Arataki rangatira. He ataahua nga mea katoa.
籤詩故事一:
◇ Zhao Zilong whakaora Adou
I te wa o nga rangatiratanga e toru, ko Zhao Yun, ko Zilong te ingoa, he tangata whenua no Changshan. I te tuatahi, i whakawhirinaki ia ki a Yuan Shao, ka whai ia Liu (Bei), te rangatira tuatahi o Western Shu.
I taua wa, ka hiahia a Cao Cao ki te haere ki te tonga o te awa o Yangtze, ka whakaekea e ia te rangatira o mua a Liu Bei i Xinye (ingoa o te waahi), a ka rere te rangatira o mua ki Fancheng. I hinga ano ia i Dangyang ka wehea nga mema o tona whanau.I tutaki a Zhao Yun ki a Wei (Mrs. Liu Bei) i raro i te pakitara whenua.
I tukuna e te wahine tana tama a Adou (tama a Liu Bei, a Liu Chan) ki a Zhao Yun. I hoatu e Zhao Yun te hoiho ki te wahine, engari kaore te wahine i whakaae, ka maka ia ia ki roto i te puna ka mate.
I muri i te tangi a Zhao Yun me te tanu i tana wahine, ka awhi ia ia Adou ka whawhai ki waho o te whakapaenga.
聖意: Inoi mo te waimarie mo to kainga, mo to oranga ake, kia whai rawa, kia whai hua, kia pai te marena, kia pai, kia pai, kia pai, kia pai, kia pai, kia pai, kia pai, kia pai, kia pai, kia pai, kia pai, kia pai, kia pai, kia pai, kia pai, kia pai, kia pai, kia pai, kia pai, kia pai. waimarie pai
古人: Ka whakaora a Zhao Zilong i a Adou
第X籤: Rua tekau ma iwa i toa i te rota
